message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $160. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hi Alice, $160 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $140.  This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'd agree once you start using it.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $140 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $120. If you can't do that, I'll have to consider other options.
